塦字的基本解释

塦
zhèn
古同“阵”。

塦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《廣韻》直刃切，去震，澄。］
亦作“塦1”。“敶2”的被通假字。“阵1”的繁体字。亦作“陳2”。
(1)军伍行列，战斗队形。
(2)列阵；布阵。
(3)引申为驻扎，屯兵。
(4)阵地；战场。
(5)战役。
(6)雷阵雨来临前乌云翻滚、电闪雷鸣的现象。
(7)成群结队貌。
(8)量词。用于表示事物或动作经过的一定时间段落。
(9)量词。群；伙。

塦字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页236第26
【字彙補】與陣同。見華山嶽廟?及石經。

塦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
塦字的起名意思

暂无。

塦
Basic explanation of words
塦
zhèn
Gu Tong "array".
塦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèn］
["Guangyun" cuts with a straight edge, shakes and clears. ]
Also known as "塦1". The false word for "敶2" was passed. The traditional characters of "阵1". Also known as "Chen 2".
(1) Army ranks and battle formations.
(2) Array; Array.
(3) The extension is stationed and stationed.
(4) Position; battlefield.
(5) Battle.
(6) The phenomenon of dark clouds rolling, lightning and thunder before the arrival of thunderstorms.
(7) Look in groups.
(8) Quantifiers. Used to indicate the passage of a certain period of time for things or actions.
(9) Quantifiers. Group; group.
塦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　塦; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 236 26
【Word Supplement】Same as the array. See Huashanyue Temple? and Shijing.
